column2:
Choose an answer to complete the sentence to Japanese:

Penguins play guitar!

ペンギンがギターを______！

Choose an answer to complete the sentence to Japanese:

Did you have dinner already?
_____晩ご飯（ばんごはん）をたべましたか

A: コーヒーをふたつください

How many coffee did A order?

A: おべんとうをむっつください

How many boxed lunch did A order?
みんな何をしていますか
